CWEs: CWE-79: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
description: The function directly assigns the 'value' or 'state[property].value' to 'elem.textContent' without any sanitization or encoding. This could lead to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks if the 'value' or 'state[property].value' contains malicious scripts.
